We-Chat - A Chat Application

We-Chat is a chat application which is made using Javascript, HTML, CSS and ReactJs. It uses react chat engine which provides the admin to add the users and make a personal chat room. The registered useres can use their credentials and login into the app and interact with each other. It allow users to exchange thoughts as well as images among them, also it tells the availabilty (online/offline) status of all the users and who all has seen the messages.

News-Nation - A News Application

News-Nation is a news website which is build on ReactJs, HTML, CSS and Javascript. It keeps the user up to date with latest news. It allows user to hover over different news categories such as business, general, health, sports and many other categores available in side drawer. It also permits user to search for a specific news with the help of search bar. With just a click user can navigate to the source point of the news and can read full news article as per their choice.

Click To Visit News-Nation

*Due to change in subscription plan of NEWS API, we can no longer fetch the data after production of the website and hence you will not see any news. News Nation -> Github
